title: Unable to login to dashboard
description: Customer reports receiving 'Invalid credentials' error after entering correct password. Happens on both desktop and mobile.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Checkout fails intermittently with a timeout when contacting the payment provider. Affects ~10% of transactions.

title: Broken image on homepage
description: Hero image on the landing page displays a broken link on Safari browsers.

title: API: inaccurate product stock counts
description: Inventory API returning stale counts for several SKUs after bulk import process.

title: Request for new report: Monthly churn
description: Customer requests a new analytics report showing monthly churn by cohort.

title: Mobile app crash on startup
description: Android app (v4.2.1) crashes immediately after launch on certain Samsung devices.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Transactional emails are delayed by up to 2 hours for users in EU region.

title: Localization: missing translations
description: Several strings in the settings page are not translated into Spanish (es-ES).

title: Slow page load during peak hours
description: Dashboard load times exceed 8s between 18:00-20:00 UTC for enterprise customers.

title: Request: add webhook for order-updates
description: Customer requests a configurable webhook to be triggered when order status changes.

title: Accessibility: insufficient color contrast
description: Several buttons on the checkout page fail WCAG contrast ratio checks.

title: Data export CSV contains malformed rows
description: CSV exports from the reports module have extra commas breaking import to Excel for certain accounts.
